description: This table contains information about the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) data stored as part of a Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) review. Each contact in this table corresponds to DRG data from one CDI review.

columns.name: CODING_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CDI_WORKING_DRG_ID
columns.description: The working diagnosis-related group (DRG) for a particular clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_WORKING_DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: CDI_DRG_REIMBURSE
columns.description: The expected reimbursement for a working diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_DRG_WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight of a working diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_DRG_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The diagnosis-related group (DRG) type of a working diagnosis-related group on the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_DRG_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: CDI_DRG_SOI_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Severity of Illness (SOI) value of a working diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Refinement not possible


Minor


Moderate


Major


Extreme


Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc


Excluded


Duplicate Diagnosis


Excluded Complication of Care

columns.name: CDI_DRG_ROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Risk of Mortality (ROM) value for a working diagnosis-related group (DRG) on the clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CDI_DRG_SOI_C_NAME

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique ID of the contact that this coding record is associated with.

columns.name: CDI_DRG_AMLOS
columns.description: The arithmetic mean length of stay for the working diagnosis related group in the Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_DRG_GMLOS
columns.description: The geometric mean length of stay for the working diagnosis related group in the Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: DRG_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The qualifier for the working diagnosis related group in the Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) review.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


HAC Dx Included


Analyzed DRG


Admission DRG


PPC DRG


PPC Admit DRG

columns.name: CDI_DRG_COMP_FLAG_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates if the diagnosis-related group (DRG) is used for comparison purposes.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
